{"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":3628,"attracts":["Butterflies"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"tetraploid daylily","description":"Tetraploid Daylily (Hemerocallis 'Tiger Time') is a unique and gorgeous perennial that grows up to 40 cm tall. It showcases deep orange flowers in midsummer. The foliage remains evergreen in milder climates and the flower appearances last for weeks in both garden containers and landscapes. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":3652,"attracts":[],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"coral bells","description":"Coral Bells, or Heuchera americana (Dale’s Strain), is a clump-forming perennial plant native to North America’s woodlands. It features beautiful dome-shaped foliage in shades of deep purple and maple, along with bell-shaped, pinkish-red flowers. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":3677,"attracts":[],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"coral bells","description":"Coral bells (Heuchera 'Crimson Curls') is an evergreen perennial that produces clusters of bright-colored bell-shaped flowers in the spring and summer. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":3777,"attracts":["Butterflies"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"hardy hibiscus","description":"Hardy Hibiscus (Hibiscus 'Lester Riegel') grows tall and strong, and provides a beautiful show of large pink blossoms all summer long. It's an easy-care shrub that tolerates a variety of soil conditions and will thrive in sun and part-sun sites up to USDA Zone 5. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":3788,"attracts":["Butterflies"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"hardy hibiscus","description":"Hardy hibiscus (Hibiscus moscheutos 'Luna Red') is a flowering perennial plant that is native to North America. It produces large, showy single or double red blooms in late summer to early fall. The flowers are surrounded by toothed and lobed green leaves, making them highly ornamental plants.
